name: Don't Blow A Gasket
description:
Feeling a little hot under the collar? Blood just about to boil? This heart is just what you need to show the world that you are just one second away from blowing your top!

Handmade anatomical Steam-punk heart pendant. This pendant is hand sculpted from polymer clay and has a tiny cog in bedded in its side. It has a matte silver and copper finish and distressed scratch and scuff marks.  It comes strung on a silver chain.

name: A Heart of Gold and Silver
description:
A heart of gold is so passe. Be at the fore front of fashion with this gold and silver mechanical wonder.


Handmade anatomical Steam-punk heart pendant. This pendant is hand sculpted from silver and gold colored polymer clay and has a tiny cog in bedded in its side. It has a matte finish and distressed scratch and scuff marks. It comes strung on a silver chain.

name: The Tin Man's Heart
description:
Well, the Tin Man may have lost his heart, but lucky for you you can get your very own right here.

Handmade anatomical Steam-punk heart pendant. This pendant is hand sculpted from polymer clay and has a tiny cog in bedded in its center. It has a shiny silver finish and distressed scratch and scuff marks. It comes strung on a silver chain.

name: Octopus Tentacles
description:
Who needs a whole octopus when you can have a pair of pretty petite colorful curly tentacles?!

These are polymer clay sculpted tentacles that come in a variety of colors on earring wires. Please indicate which color you would like for the base and which color you would like for the suckers. Do this by using the contact page. Please include which item you purchased, your color choices and the date and time of your purchase.

This product is also available in singles on a silver chain as pendants. If you'd like a single pendant, please indicate this in the choice menu.
